review_blob: What a great beer! it smells very fruity with some definite hops aroma. the color was a golden hue with a 1/2" inch head that disappated quickly. the taste is very similar to most pale ales with a fruity taste with hops present. however, there is a definite rye tanginess that hits the palate. Overall a very good beer to be enjoyed.

You guys act like this beer is mule piss. Ok, its not the best in the world but for the american macro style its one of the best and one of the cheapest. It will obviously never win awards, but its so inoffensive anyone can drink it. I  drink it as my "everyday" drinker and opt for better beers when I have the dough.
